name: Ma3
description:
Welcome to MA3! In this open world game, you play the role of Mahi. Who lives in a busy city where crime happens frequently. you’ll live as a transporter but you also have a hidden life as a masked vigilante, MA3. MA3 saves people from the bad people such as kidnappers and killers.

Key Features:


  • As Mahi you’ll do some work like transporting cars and passengers.
  • As a side job you can drive a taxi.
  • You gain money from your work and can spend your earned money to buy food, guns, medicines and other items.
  • As the masked vigilante MA3 you save people from others and kill enemies such as kidnappers and killers.
  • When the public is disturbed the police will be on high alert and will targeted.
  • Expect a lot of mixed actions of physical combat, intense gun fights, sword fights, hunting animals and many more high octane moments.
  • Enjoy tearing up the streets in different cars and even steal police cars, but careful as you will be targeted by the police when you steal the police cars.
